display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
display_long_description_unprocessed:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=laRF97oR_UAQ7kNvwHlYFsB&_nc_oc=AdnN2XTqim8OtklMk07lkk46MwoqiDi7PIDJJTXFA8eu16n7SjhEkt6AizaOpiTIstk&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=EeloEFudhEfWSOmGk66sSg&oh=00_AfN5Vald83Pi0PdjYXp0txnxTrqSfmDndhV-PQFxflpSBg&oe=685B1E1D)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=N-hUvpkhZkYQ7kNvwEqd7Am&_nc_oc=AdnPl80jLWM_LiNbtQM_RnBnF5aDxldZekw26NPUAHOf12seSShwL1mRkV_2pVvSAUQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=EeloEFudhEfWSOmGk66sSg&oh=00_AfMB7OvgmN0VBYIRIPLVZ2IenWt7vGjnAF1ZD_AT3TWHkg&oe=685B3812)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=fDyd4AOS4fMQ7kNvwEdUwfU&_nc_oc=AdkL4P5_rfW_ui_vzvn9QSoI_PZYDzHaGCDfk2QrfxNGqlDu5DOANHbXVc7Me3Zk0MY&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=EeloEFudhEfWSOmGk66sSg&oh=00_AfNTXr1DtZWuvT-M2eLema2Oje77KX1HYWthPQBEtfTmGg&oe=685B3E23)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=-srds1ejpSsQ7kNvwHi6eMU&_nc_oc=Adkxzp9kl2iBEKVsqDlvuBNvzkzH3RAC2f-AQ-R0BH1Fpzoyqip5S5Do94xAzLtNg68&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=EeloEFudhEfWSOmGk66sSg&oh=00_AfOWe-0ib8KGb5Y_hbgGNiFNlngQLPm3dPzkDNWLLC_bng&oe=685B34AE)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982508_850050307226020_5528409964007448806_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=gXQ4jz8KANwQ7kNvwGZB_fs&_nc_oc=AdlbKlB1h3DvQGHhdvzdqsp2YSTg5dYaaMaqs8xGQelireZRM9ThVXfeBJuK4j6iPKQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=EeloEFudhEfWSOmGk66sSg&oh=00_AfNI7jvOU4cn2OIaC5Tu0PnokQVB2xJ5SEIJE2Y7qnPlVA&oe=685B3C96)











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
